data.message: Today it's the anniversary of my love for Marshall mathers and his music,  today 16 years ago, I started to love his work and I am very proud that after everything he went through he come back more strong than ever before. I am so proud to be his friend even if it is In my mental wanking 😂😂😉. I am very proud of being a Stan Eminem most amazing insane fan and I will be until I die even if his new twat wifey say that he hates us. I love you my dear friend Marshall and I will always pray for you and your family. I wish that he gives us a new great album. I LOVE YOU MR ASSHOLE. 😉😍😘😎
